Cheyenne.Frontier Mall: Frontier Mall is an enclosed shopping mall located in Cheyenne, Wyoming. The 519,471-square-foot (48,260.4 m2) mall opened March 18, 1981. Managed by CBL & Associates Properties of Chattanooga, Tennessee, it is Wyoming's second biggest mall, boasting 67 shops, including five anchor stores: two Dillard's locations, JCPenney, Planet Fitness and Sears.
